name: The Investigation Continues
description: The mystery deepens. More clues await on this new section of the train.

clue_d.name: Detective's Findings
clue_d.description: The railway inspector has discovered that the stolen cargo contained rare artifacts. The theft was well-planned and coordinated.
clue_d.hint: Detective Martinez has been investigating this case for weeks.

clue_e.name: Engineer's Discovery
clue_e.description: The train's engineer found evidence that someone tampered with the locomotive's systems to ensure the delay at the last station.
clue_e.hint: Engineer Williams knows every mechanical detail of this train.
